 Yeah, I know it's a tough choice. The first one that comes to my head is Hannibal Lecter in Silence of the Lambs.

I might be able to think of a better one given enough time but the first one that comes to my mind is Vin Diesel. No, not for Fast and the Furious but rather for his efforts in Pitch Black. With Pitch Black there wasn't even a good story to tell but his character made it into one of my favorite movies of all time.
 
 A strong runner up would be Johnny Depp in Pirates of the Caribbean.

Premier magazine probably picked Marlon Brando as the Godfather. I didn't care all that much for the movie or the character. I would pick Gregory Peck's role as Atticus Finch in To Kill A Mockingbird.
Alex from Clockwork Orange. God that's an awesome movie. Cane-knife, codpiece, suspenders, and raping random women, need I say more?

Premier magazine probably picked Marlon Brando as the Godfather. I didn't care all that much for the movie or the character. I would pick Gregory Peck's role as Atticus Finch in To Kill A Mockingbird.

 I liked Don Corleone, Finch was pretty good.

Alex from Clockwork Orange. God that's an awesome movie. Cane-knife, codpiece, suspenders, and raping random women, need I say more?

 Alex was a trip wasn't he? I need to watch that again--it's been a while. It seems like the bad guys are always best. Hmmm, what other Kubrick characters...the computer on 2001? The sargeant in Full Metal Jacket? Peter Sellers playing Dr. Strangelove? So many...

All of those characters are verry good. However the #1 best character of all time in a movie was Wiliam Walace played by Mel Gibson in the movie Brave Heart!!!! I also enjoyed Robert Gould Shaw played Mathew Broderick in Glory. Another good one was Jack torance played by Jack Nicholson in The Shineing. Last but not least Brad Pit & Bruce Willis in Twelve Monkeys.
 
 I think thats all.

Robert Duvall's character in anything (well, maybe not in Sling Blade). When he plays a part, whoever that character is "supposed" to be eventually turns out to be Bob Duvall.
